page.component.input.doc.prop.icon: Class name of the icon to append
page.component.input.doc.prop.type: Type of input: email, text, number
page.component.input.doc.prop.with-icon: Allows default icon based on component type (default true)
page.component.input.doc.slot.prepend: Slot used to insert custom content at the beginning of component
page.component.input.doc.slot.append: Slot used to insert custom content et the end of component
